name.baseName: Production stage ; crude oil ; seismic exploration, drilling, and well repair
开采阶段;原油;地震勘探、钻井、修井

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The main engineering categories to be carried out in the exploration and exploitation stage of petroleum include seismic exploration, drilling, workover, oil and gas accumulation and storage, etc. . According to the different regions are divided into onshore oil mining and offshore oil mining. In these processes, the main impact on the environment are noise, waste water, waste gas, and solid waste, but the most important is waste water, solid waste, these two parts. The following analysis of their impact and energy consumption
石油在勘探开采阶段要进行的主要工程类别有地 震勘探、钻井、修井、油气集储等。按照开采地域的不 同又分为陆上石油的开采和海洋石油的开采。在这 些过程中对环境产生的影响主要有噪音、废水、废气 和固体废弃物等但最主要的是废水、固体废弃物这两 个部分。以下对它们所产生的影响及所要消耗的能量 进行分析

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The main engineering categories to be carried out in petroleum exploration and production stage include seismic exploration, drilling, workover, oil and gas storage. According to the different areas of exploitation, it is divided into onshore oil exploitation and offshore oil exploitation. In these processes, the impact on the environment is mainly noise, waste water, waste gas and solid waste, but the most important is the two parts of wastewater and solid waste. Seismic exploration is usually divided into three stages: seismic data acquisition, processing and interpretation. The techniques commonly used in seismic exploration include seismic source release (such as explosion source or vibration source), seismometer layout, seismic data recording and digital processing. Drilling technology involves the selection and operation of drilling equipment, the design and use of drill bit and drill pipe, and the circulation and management of drilling fluid. Common drilling methods include rotary drilling, circulation drilling and non-circulation drilling.Workover technology involves the repair of borehole wall, installation and fixing of casing, cement sealing and so on. The operation of the workover depends on the depth of the hole, the geology and the condition of the hole.

石油在勘探开采阶段要进行的主要工程类别有地震勘探、钻井、修井、油气集储等。按照开采地域的不同, 又分为陆上石油的开采和海洋石油的开采。在这些过程中, 对环境产生的影响主要有噪音、废水、废气和固体废弃物等, 但最主要的是废水、固体废弃物这两个部分。地震勘探通常分为地震资料采集、处理和解释三个阶段。地震勘探中常用的技术包括地震震源的释放（如爆炸源或振动源）、地震检波器的布设、地震资料的记录和数字处理等。钻井技术涉及钻井设备的选择和操作、钻头和钻杆的设计和使用、钻井液的循环和管理等方面。常见的钻井方式包括旋挖钻井、循环钻井和非循环钻井等。修井技术涉及井眼壁面的修复、套管的安装和固定、水泥封固等工艺。修井的具体操作取决于井眼的深度、地质条件和井眼状况。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The data set represents the various activities involved in the exploration and exploitation stages of crude oil in the Jianghan Oilfield. The technical usage includes seismic exploration, drilling, and well repair, with a focus on applications for onshore and offshore oil extraction. This covers oil and gas accumulation, storage, and efforts to mitigate environmental impacts from noise, waste water, waste gas, and solid waste discharge during these processes. The data provided could be instrumental for developing strategies to reduce resource consumption and waste production in the petroleum sector.
该数据集代表了江汉油田原油勘探和开采阶段涉及的各种活动。技术用途包括地震勘探、钻井和修井，重点应用于陆上和海洋石油开采。这覆盖了油气积累、储存以及在这些过程中减轻噪音、废水、废气和固体废物排放对环境影响的努力。所提供的数据对于制定减少石油部门资源消耗和废物生成的策略至关重要。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: (1) from the energy consumption table, it can be seen that the oil loss rate is high in the stage of exploitation and refining, so it is necessary to take measures to reduce the loss in this process. (2) because of the large amount of wastewater in the process of oil exploitation and use, it is necessary to recycle the wastewater to reduce pollution and save water. (3) from the view of the whole life cycle, the use of oil is more polluting. But it has a wide range of applications and so many products that there are no alternatives in the short term.
（1）从能耗表中可以看到在开采和炼制阶段石 油损耗率较大因此有必要采取措施减少在此过程中 的损耗量。 （2）在石油的开采和使用过程中废水的数量较 多故须对水回收再利用以减少废水污染并节约用 水。 （3）从整个生命周期来看石油的利用污染比较大。但是其应用广泛产品众多所以在短时期内还没 有可替代品。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 董志强,马晓茜,张凌.石油利用对环境影响的生命周期分析[J].石油与天然气化工,2004(06):456-459.
董志强,马晓茜,张凌.石油利用对环境影响的生命周期分析[J].石油与天然气化工,2004(06):456-459.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this LCA data set should take into account the high oil loss rates during the exploitation and refining stages, adopting measures to minimize losses. Special attention is required for water recycling and reuse to mitigate wastewater pollution and conserve resources. Considering the significant environmental impacts throughout the life cycle of oil usage, data users should incorporate the provided data into a broader environmental management strategy, while factoring in the current lack of viable alternatives to petroleum products and their widespread application.
生命周期评价数据集的用户应考虑到在勘探和炼制阶段石油损耗率较高的问题，采取措施尽量减少损失。需要特别注意水的回收利用，以减轻废水污染并节约资源。考虑到石油使用全生命周期的显著环境影响，数据用户应将提供的数据纳入更广泛的环境管理策略中，同时考虑到目前尚缺乏能够替代石油产品的可行选择以及其广泛的应用场景。

completeness.common:other: Input: electric water oil hydrogen catalyst output: CnHm CO2 hydrocarbon gas, lead compounds, soot and other waste gas, waste water and solid waste
输入：电 水 油 氢 催化剂输出：CnHm CO2 烃类气体 铅化物 烟尘等废气、废水和固体废弃物

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: Percentage of crude oil produced per unit of oil field for self-use
油田单位原油生产自用百分数
